name: H&R Block 2015 Tax Return
summary: Learn about .T15 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The T15 file can be saved and worked on at a later time. Once you finish, you can electronically file the return directly from the H&R Block software or H&R Block Online. The return can also be printed and mailed to the appropriate tax authorities.

description: Tax return created and used by the 2015 version of H&R Block Tax Software and H&R Block Online; contains U.S. federal tax forms, any necessary state tax forms for 2015, and personal tax information entered by the user.
